name: Texas Caviar Wisconsin-Style
author: TerryR
summary: Texas caviar is great with corn chip scoops or just on its own. Play with the recipe and add more items. You want all your vegetables diced to roughly the same size. This is a family favorite. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black-eyed peas, drained and rinsed
directions: Combine the cider vinegar and sugar in a small saucepan; bring to a boil and cook until the volume is reduced to about 1 cup
Remove from heat and allow to cool completely
Mix the shoepeg corn, celery, black-eyed peas, green bell pepper, and avocado together in a bowl
Pour the cooled vinegar mixture over the corn mixture; gently toss to coat
